cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Ryoto enters, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains reconstruct until end of turn. Its reconstruct cost is equal to {2} plus its mana cost. [i](You may cast that card from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile it.)[/i]

Lifelink
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control get +2/+2 and lose all abilities until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]What a terrible thing it is, to erase one's identity in order to be loved.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When Remnant of Rocket enters, create a 3/2 white Beast creature token. 
Whenever Remnant of Rocket and at least two other creatures attack, Remnant of Rocket deals 3 damage to the defending player.

Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Then if this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
[i][i]Paradox[/i] — [/i]Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card. Then discard a card unless that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand.

Flash
When Maven of Disaster enters, if you cast it, exile target creature or spell. Return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

Trample
When Cliffside Crusher enters, if you have three or more land cards in your graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]For some monsters, the calamity changed little; destruction was already part of their nature.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Dregs of Industry enters, choose one —
• Exile up to three cards from graveyards.
• Remove all counters from target permanent.

Trample
When Excavation Mole enters, mill three cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rebuilding the world had to start from the underground up. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If this spell was cast from your graveyard, you may put it onto the battlefield instead. Shuffle. 
Reconstruct {4}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
When Doomed Trainer dies, create a 3/2 white Beast creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It's okay. Just wait here. I'll be back by morning, alright?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When Treetop Trapper enters, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Up to one target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rabid monsters aren't the only threat awaiting those journeying into the Wilds.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Commune [i]({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.)[/i]
Haste

Trample
When Bellowing Behemoth enters, you may sacrifice a land or discard a land card. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn.

Menace
{2}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gluttonous Ghost. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The calamity forced some monsters to move to foreign ecosystems, creating striking new hierarchies and food chains.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. If fewer than two cards were exiled this way, you may draw a card and lose 1 life.
Reconstruct {5}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]

When Partner in Crime enters, create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You lose 1 life.
Partner in Crime can't block.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No matter who its companions are, rest assured: this monster never hunts alone. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Despair [i](When this creature attacks, if it isn't decayed, you may have it succumb to despair. If you do, it gains decayed at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i] 
Deathtouch
When Mournful Amnesiac succumbs to despair, it gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.
When Beauty of the Wastes enters, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind it already has.

Surveil 1, then draw a card.
Reconstruct {2}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In some regions, the calamity forced monsters and humans closer than they'd ever been before. In others, it drove them apart, shattering centuries of symbiosis.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Commune [i]({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.)[/i]
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Pacifying Predator attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Through prolonged contact with humans, monsters learnt new methods of survival.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As Karina was pulled through the time rift, the last thing she saw was the Warden's smile.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Despair [i](When this creature attacks, if it isn't decayed, you may have it succumb to despair. If you do, it gains decayed at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i] 
When Lonely Youngling succumbs to despair, it gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

When Wandering Vagabonds enters, search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
During your turn, Wandering Vagabonds has first strike.
When Preserved Specimens enters or dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]With entire habitats destroyed and several species facing imminent extinction, Professor Maple was left with a single option. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
[i][i]Paradox[/i] — [/i]Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It can't be blocked this turn.
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Shrieking Pest deals 2 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]To adapt to the new world, some monsters evolved. Others regressed, adopting traits of their ancestors.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Sunset Chaser enters, choose one —
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, draw a card.

Golems you control have haste.
Unrelenting Titan can't attack or block unless you control three or more Golems.
Whenever Unrelenting Titan enters or attacks, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
{3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Golem creature token.
When Chikyu's Champion enters, search your library for a battle card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Chikyu's Champion deals 151 damage to it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Years after his companions have passed, he still roams the region, protecting people and monsters alike. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Commune [i]({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.)[/i]
When Conduit of Change enters, it deals damage equal to the number of tapped creatures you control to any target. You gain that much life.

When Rage of the Reef enters, search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.
When Rage of the Reef dies, if it isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it.

When Dark-Dwelling Mycellium enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.

This Equipment enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a counter from this Equipment: Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. Activate once each turn and only as a sorcery.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on this Equipment.
Equip {1} [i]({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]

When Brick by Brick enters, discard a card, then draw a card. 
At the beginning of your end step, if there are three or more land cards in your graveyard, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Brick by Brick.
At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent left the battlefield under your control this turn, you draw a card and gain 3 life.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“If there is any hope for civilization, it rests on the backs of selfless creatures like these.”
— Ryoto, Wilds Walker[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i][i]Paradox[/i] — [/i]Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put a loyalty counter on Karina.
[-1]: Exile the top card of each player's library. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn by discarding a card, sacrificing a permanent, or paying 3 life in addition to their other costs, and you may spend mana of any color to cast them this way.
[-4]: Exile a card from your graveyard. You may cast a card exiled by Karina without paying its mana cost.

[+1]: Draw a card, then target opponent may exile a card from their hand. If they don't, draw another card.
[0]: Sanaito becomes a 5/5 Faerie Wizard creature with lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.
[-2]: Exile target permanent.
[-4]: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

cards.rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.)[/i]
When The City Made Wild enters, up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
cards.rules_text2: Whenever The Stone Made Steel attacks, target creature with lesser power can't block this turn.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]It is the labor of a century, a testament to the inexorable, enduring power of the natural world.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.)[/i]
When Bump in the Road enters, tap all creatures target player controls and put a stun on each of them.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]Once it has been roused from its slumber, it is nigh-impossible to get it to rest again. The only way to get it back to sleep is to direct its energy elsewhere, tiring it out.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.)[/i]
When First Contact enters, it deals 2 damage to any target. Draw a card.
cards.rules_text2:
Haste
When this creature transforms into Beginning of the End, each player exiles their hand. They may play cards exiled this way for as long as they remain exiled.
Players can't cast spells from their hand.
If a player would draw a card, they exile the top card of their library instead. They may play that card until the beginning of their next end step.
